E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/29/1992
Subject: Progress of John Barfield
Dear Sir,
John Barfield is doing pretty good at A Cedar Rapids Reds!
He has an ERA of 2.05, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 6/2/1992
Subject: Progress of Esteban Beltre
Dear Sir,
Esteban Beltre has an AVG of .315 at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 6/2/1992
Subject: Progress of Bob Wells
Dear Sir,
Bob Wells has nothing more to prove at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
He has an ERA of 3.80 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 6/13/1992

Mike Scott
